issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
No controls are displayed while playing the video

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to KS> Phone>Camera> video Record.
2. Click on Start video to record video.
3. Click on Stop video. The recorded video is played after that.

Actual: 
No controls are displayed while the video is being played.

Expected: The controls should be displayed
fields.summary: iOS7: Camera Video Record -  No controls are displayed while playing the video
fields.environment:
SDK:3.1.1 GA
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201307091843
OS: OSX 10.7.5
Device:iPad3(iOS 7)
Xcode: 5.0 Beta 2

comments.body: could have been an apple bug.
Tested on iPad 4 running iOS 7 DP 5 with TiSDK 3.2.0.v20130806110850

Closing as cannot reproduce - could be an Apple bug :)
